com.communote.server.core.user

Class UserProfileManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.user.UserProfileManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserProfileManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserProfileManagementImpl

    public abstract class UserProfileManagementBase
extends Object
implements UserProfileManagement

    Spring Service base class for com.communote.server.service.user.UserProfileManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    UserProfileManagement

      • handleRemoveUserImage

        protected abstract boolean handleRemoveUserImage(Long userId)
                                          throws AuthorizationException,
                                                 UserNotFoundException
        Remove the image of a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user whose image should be removed
        Returns:
        true if the image was removed or false if the user did not have a custom image
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the user whose image should be removed or client manager or internal system user
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user with ID userId does not exist

      • handleUpdateImage

        protected abstract void handleUpdateImage(Long userId,
                                          byte[] userImage)
                                   throws UserNotFoundException,
                                          AuthorizationException
        Update the image of a user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The users id.
        largeUserImage - The user image as byte array.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the user whose image should be updated or the current user is not client manager or internal system user
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user with ID userId does not exist

                        throws UserNotFoundException,
                               AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserProfileManagement
        Remove the image of a user.
        Specified by:
        removeUserImage in interface UserProfileManagement

        true if the image was removed or false if the user did not have a custom image
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user with ID userId does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the user whose image should be updated or the current user is not client manager or internal system user

                        AuthorizationException

        Specified by:

        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user with ID userId does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the user whose image should be updated or the current user is not client manager or internal system user

      • updateNotificationConfig

        public void updateNotificationConfig(Map<MessagerConnectorType,MessagerConnectorConfigTO> connectorConfigs)
        Updates the notification configuration of the current user by adding new, removing or updating existing messager connector configurations.
        Specified by:
        updateNotificationConfig in interface UserProfileManagement
        Parameters:
        connectorConfigs - a definition with the new connector configurations. Configurations for connector types that are not yet part of the notification configuration of the current user will be added. Configurations with connector types that are part of the current notification configuration but that are not listed in the mapping will be removed. All the the other configurations will be updated if necessary.
